changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE document_tree ( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, parent_id BIGINT NULL, name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, description MEDIUMTEXT NULL, left_branch BIGINT NOT NULL, right_branch BIGINT NOT NULL, level BIGINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id), INDEX doc_tree_left_IDX (left_branch ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX doc_tree_right_IDX (right_branch ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX doc_tree_leftright_IDX (left_branch ASC, right_branch ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX doc_tree_parent_FK_idx (parent_id ASC) VISIBLE, CONSTRAINT doc_tree_parent_FK FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES document_tree (id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE RESTRICT ); ; INSERT INTO document_tree (name, description, left_branch, right_branch, level) VALUES ('root', 'this is a root of the document hierarchy', 1, 2, 0);
